description: This file provides analytics data fetching functions for a food ordering frontend, including mock data generation and API calls for daily sales, peak hours, top items, and combined summaries.

methods.name: getDailySales
methods.description: Fetches daily sales data, either from API or mock data.

methods.name: getPeakHours
methods.description: Fetches peak hour data, either from API or mock data.

methods.name: getTopItems
methods.description: Fetches top ordered items, either from API or mock data.

methods.name: getSummary
methods.description: Fetches combined analytics summary including daily sales, peak hours, and top items.
